name: Wary Futuristic 2.0
description:
Wary Futuristic 2.0 is an action/adventure/fantasy/indie game.

This game contains a lot of shooting and jumping.
Also you can knock cars out of the road.
Every single part of the road you go through
you earn one point. The points are
in the top-right corner.
You can choose the level of difficulty
which is displayed on the top-left corner.

You can see some gameplay on the right.
